name: Time Again
description:
You are trapped in a time loop. Reach the rift to try and escape, but when you do you may be thrust back to the start - and the version of you that escaped is there too! And might just make things a little bit harder...

How many loops can you make it through?

Made for Ludum Dare 40 - The More You Have The Worse It Is

WASD or arrow keys to move
Space to jump / double jump
X or J to shoot
R to reset the time loop
